rows.label: tlk001201_07_msg0001
rows.name:
To think they would
control Genbu himself...

rows.label: tlk001201_07_msg0002
rows.name:
We have already ceased production
of Core Chips, as there is no longer
a need to offer them to Acedia.

rows.label: tlk001201_07_msg0003
rows.name:
I had been hoping Genbu's strength would gradually
return and that he would once more become a prosperous
Divine Beast, but just as I thought that...

rows.label: tlk001201_07_msg0004
rows.name: Acedia is truly an unforgivable entity.

rows.label: tlk001201_07_msg0005
rows.name:
And there is one more thing
I have come to understand.

rows.label: tlk001201_07_msg0006
rows.name:
That we have no choice
but to entrust the future
of Alst to all of you.
